name: ONLY SO MANY PLACES
description:
You are nine years old.
Your mom punished you by taking away your video game console's power cable.

This is unacceptable.

Search the objects around your home.

Find the power cable.

Avoid mom's gaze while she completes tasks around the house.

Evan Walsh's entry for the Game Off 2021 game jam. Source code is available under the GPLv3 license. The audio/visual content is licensed via the CC BY-SA 4.0 license.

This work uses Pixica fonts by Rob Ruana, licensed under CC BY 4.0.

macOS help

If you cannot run the game on macOS, you may need to follow these instructions: disable-gatekeeper.github.io
